result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua D Kosterman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Joshua D Kosterman in court with attorney Christopher J Simonds.  Rebecca L Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Kim Slaasted.
Ms. Tran asks that no contact order be lifted and that the GPS be removed from Austin Kosterman. The State notes that deft has a ZCI violations but indicates that the grandmother went to the store, not him. The State objects to GPS being removed-argument put on the record. 
Mr. Younglove, on behalf of Stephanie Kosterman-asks that the no contact be lifted-puts argument on the record.
Mr. Simonds, on behalf of Joshua Kosterman puts argument for no contact on the record.

The State objects-puts argument on the record.

BTC: Austin Kosterman - Modify bond to remove GPS. May not live in the home but may have verbal communication with parents/co-defts.
        Joshua Kosterman - May have verbal communication with child. May have contact with Stephanie Kosterman. Not to discuss the case at all.
        Stephanie Kosterman - May have verbal communication with child. May have contact with Joshua Kosterman. Not to dicsuss the case at all.
